name: Blazing Prismshell
desc:
A whole piece of radiant shell liberated from a Furnace Shell Mountain Weasel's back after its defeat.
It is said that the more Phlogiston a Furnace Shell Mountain Weasel has stored in its back, the higher its status in the pack. The reasoning for this phenomenon may be quite simple: More dominant Furnace Shell Mountain Weasels likely have less need to call on their Phlogiston reserves than their less prominent peers.

customize.name: Furnace Shell Mountain Weasel
customize.desc:
An ancient variant of mountain weasel that has adapted to a unique, Phlogiston-rich environment isolated from the outside world.
By consuming creatures rich in Phlogiston, this species accumulates power in the shell it holds. After a prolonged existence in the ruins of the Sacred Mountain, its affinity for Phlogiston seems to have caused it to be influenced by the Source Mechanisms within the ruins, creating a unique symbiotic relationship between them.

customize.name: Blazing Prismshell
customize.desc:
A whole piece of radiant shell liberated from a Furnace Shell Mountain Weasel's back after its defeat.
It is said that the more Phlogiston a Furnace Shell Mountain Weasel has stored in its back, the higher its status in the pack. The reasoning for this phenomenon may be quite simple: More dominant Furnace Shell Mountain Weasels likely have less need to call on their Phlogiston reserves than their less prominent peers.

customize.name: Masterless Starglitter
customize.desc:
Currency used to purchase rare resources from the Shop.
Surplus Starglitter of destiny. Perhaps it can light up other corners of the universe.

customize.name: Blazing Prismshell
customize.desc:
A whole piece of radiant shell liberated from a Furnace Shell Mountain Weasel's back after its defeat.
It is said that the more Phlogiston a Furnace Shell Mountain Weasel has stored in its back, the higher its status in the pack. The reasoning for this phenomenon may be quite simple: More dominant Furnace Shell Mountain Weasels likely have less need to call on their Phlogiston reserves than their less prominent peers.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Warm Back-Shell
customize.desc:
A portion of shell removed from a Furnace Shell Mountain Weasel's back after its defeat.
Furnace Shell Mountain Weasels accumulate Phlogiston in their shells from feeding to be used in emergencies. The sight of them blazing fiery trails over the Sacred Mountain has not been seen since ancient times.

customize.name: Vivid Notions
customize.desc: A trophy made from gemstones from the Collective of Plenty and crystals from the Flower-Feather Clan. It is said to have once belonged to a legendary wrestler.

customize.name: Cold-Cracked Shellshard
customize.desc:
A chunk of shell carved from a Furnace Shell Mountain Weasel's back after its defeat.
Where it once blazed brightly, this piece has long since gone cold. The fire-like luster it once held is no more.

customize.name: Warm Back-Shell
customize.desc:
A portion of shell removed from a Furnace Shell Mountain Weasel's back after its defeat.
Furnace Shell Mountain Weasels accumulate Phlogiston in their shells from feeding to be used in emergencies. The sight of them blazing fiery trails over the Sacred Mountain has not been seen since ancient times.

value.text:
Crafted
Dropped by Lv. 60+ Furnace Shell Mountain Weasels
